settings.content_text: Co-founded by Cristina Rojas and Yair Mayo, CY is a hybrid creative space with a curated collection of crafted objects and furniture selected through our own aesthetic and emotional sensibilities. We believe in teaming up with artists to create custom and unique projects, as well as selecting from established names and brands. CY is a bridge for design styles and sensibilities across multiple decades. We envision dialogues between objects through time.
